title: Rename 'MANAGE REVIEWS' navigation option to 'Movie Reviews'

requirements.summary: Rename the navigation option labeled 'MANAGE REVIEWS' to 'Movie Reviews' in all frontend navigation components
acceptanceCriteria: The navigation item previously labeled 'MANAGE REVIEWS' now displays as 'Movie Reviews'
The label change is reflected in both desktop and mobile navigation in the Header component
The label change is reflected in the Footer component if it appears there
Clicking the renamed 'Movie Reviews' link still navigates to the same admin reviews page
No other navigation labels are changed

file_operations.description: Update the navigation link text from 'MANAGE REVIEWS' to 'Movie Reviews' in both desktop and mobile navigation sections. Ensure the route path to the admin reviews page remains unchanged (/admin/reviews).
Update the footer navigation link text from 'MANAGE REVIEWS' to 'Movie Reviews' if it appears in the quick links or category links section. Ensure the route path remains unchanged.
